4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: Nazli is a beautiful girl at the age of 24 who suffers from heart-harvesting illness. The only cure for your illness is heart transplantation. But he can not tell him that his only father knows the truth but can not find a heart to be sent to his daughter. In the meantime, she meets the Firat, who owns a construction company. They fall in love with each other. But their love is the most painful and unfortunate one. Nazli and Firat remain forced to leave at the end of a single love-filled night. Because Nazli learned that the day before the heart transplant, she will die. Her father is going to be a killer to keep her alive. In the end it becomes a struggle without suffering, a victorious life of our heroes. And the only eternal truth of Nazli and Firat's immortal love.
